channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS

item.title: Report X-2023120647
item.description:
Report X-2023120647

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-09T06:14:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-08
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS BEING LOADED WHEN LEAKAGE WAS NOTICED AND BROUGHT TO QUALITY ASSURANCE DescribePack: WHEN BOX WAS OPENED 1 BOTTLE CAP WAS LOOSE, WHEN TAKEN OFF, THE CLOSURE WAS OPENED. DurationRel: -1 and MitigateEffect: ONCE LEAKAGE WAS NOTICED, IT WAS IMMEDIATELY TURNED RIGHT SIDE UP AND BROUGHT TO QUALITY ASSURANCE.
